Symbol.Script_2D:
!bFixedPanelLeft = (gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED) !bFixedPanelRight = (gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED)
PanelNumLeft = 1 if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M then PanelNumLeft = 2 PanelNumRight = 1 if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M then PanelNumRight = 2
bSlidingLeft = gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M bSlidingRight = gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M
bMirroredLeft = gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M bMirroredRight = gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M
gs_fillLeaf = gs_fillLeaf * gs_bFills gs_FillSdl = gs_FillSdl * gs_bFills
toleranceDiff = (gs_tolerance_right - gs_tolerance_left) / 2
bHotspotEdit2D=1
if gs_frame_wthk=0 then temp_frame_thk=-gs_frame_thk else temp_frame_thk=-gs_frame_thkin endif
pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
drawindex 40
lod2D = DET2D_FS_OFF bShowRebate = 0 bShowRebateOnFixGlass = 0 rebateWidth = 0
if iLoD2D = SYMBD_S_1LINE then lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE ! Simple --> INT 200 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_S_1LINECL then lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE ! Simple --> NLD 200 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_M_1LINELEAF_2LINE then lod2D = DET2D_FS_MIDDLE ! Middle --> INT 100 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_M_2LINELEAFCL_GLASS then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED ! Middle --> NLD 100 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LINELEAFOP_GLASS then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED ! Detailed --> INT 50 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_1LINELEAF_GLASS then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED ! Detailed --> SWE 50 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LINELEAFCL_REBATEONGLASS then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED ! Detailed --> NLD 50 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LEAFOPGLASS_GLASS then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED ! Detailed --> DAN 20 if iLoD2D = SYMBD_S_2LINE then lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI ! Chinese Simple if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LINELEAFOP_2LINE then lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED_CHI ! Chinese Detailed
if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LINELEAFOP_GLASS then ! Detailed --> INT 50 bShowRebate = 1 endif if iLoD2D = SYMBD_D_2LINELEAFCL_REBATEONGLASS then ! Detailed --> NLD 50 bShowRebate = 1 bShowRebateOnFixGlass = 1 endif
if iTypeDemolitionFill = 2 then ! RENOVATION_FILL_DEMOLISHED line_type gs_Demolition_linetype else line_type 1 endif
! ============================================================================== ! Left Sidelight ! ==============================================================================
if gs_sidelight_left then
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE then ! 1:200 line2 -ac_unit_width/2-gs_frame_ovhg_left_out, 0, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_sl_w1 - gs_frame_width_left_2,0 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_MIDDLE then ! 1:100 fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_frame_pen_cont
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_frw1, 0,1, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_sl_w1-gs_frame_width_left_2, 0, 1, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_sl_w1-gs_frame_width_left_2, temp_frame_thk, 1, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_frw1, temp_frame_thk, 1 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED then ! 1:50
rebateWidth = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebate | bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
if bOpeningDirectionSL then add2 0,temp_frame_thk mul2 1,-1 endif
reb_mod_y = 0 GlassWidth_VGrid2 = 0 if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED then if iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk - (bShowRebateOnFixGlass * gs_sidelight_rebate_depth) if iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then line_property 2 line2 -ac_unit_width/2+gs_frw1, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth, -ac_unit_width/2+gs_sl_w1-gs_frame_width_left_2, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth line_property 0 else rebateWidth = 0 endif endif else if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_HOR_PIVOT | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_VER_PIVOT | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_VER_PIVOT_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | \ gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then rebateWidth = 0
! The Opening Sash is always inside by Single Hung and Double Hung Sash Type if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk endif else reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk - gs_sidelight_rebate_depth endif endif
! Change sash width size by mullion style if (iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_FRENCH_PANEL) then _sashFrameWidthLeft = sashFrameWidth[1][9] _sashFrameWidthRight = sashFrameWidth[2][9] else _sashFrameWidthLeft = gs_sl_fw _sashFrameWidthRight = gs_sl_fw endif
LeftTotalWidth = gs_sl_w1 - gs_frw1 - gs_frame_width_left_2 + 2 * rebateWidth PanelWidth = LeftTotalWidth if PanelNumLeft = 2 then if bSlidingLeft then PanelWidth = LeftTotalWidth/2 + (min(_sashFrameWidthLeft, _sashFrameWidthRight))/2 else PanelWidth = LeftTotalWidth/2 endif endif if vgn_09 > 0 then GlassWidth_VGrid2 = (LeftTotalWidth - (vgn_09 - 1) * gs_sidelight_div_width) / (vgn_09)
add2 -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_frw1 - rebateWidth + LeftTotalWidth/2, 0 if bMirroredLeft then mul2 -1, 1
if gs_frame_thkin > gs_sl_thk then
fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_frame_pen_cont
if bSlidingLeft then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, LeftTotalWidth/2 - PanelWidth, 0, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, -LeftTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk, 0, LeftTotalWidth/2 - PanelWidth, -gs_sl_thk, 0
add2 0, -gs_sl_thk poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + PanelWidth, 0, 0, LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, LeftTotalWidth/2, -1 * min(gs_sl_thk, -temp_frame_thk-gs_sl_thk), -temp_frame_thk <= 2*gs_sl_thk, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + PanelWidth, -1 * min(gs_sl_thk, -temp_frame_thk-gs_sl_thk), 0
if -temp_frame_thk > 2*gs_sl_thk then add2 0, -gs_sl_thk poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + PanelWidth, 0, 0, -LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, -LeftTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk+2*gs_sl_thk, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk+2*gs_sl_thk, 0 del 1 endif del 1 else if iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, LeftTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2, 0, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 endif
else _glassWidthOv = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
put LeftTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk, 1 put LeftTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
if vgn_09 > 1 then for i = 0 to vgn_09-2 put LeftTotalWidth/2 - GlassWidth_VGrid2 - i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width), -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2 - GlassWidth_VGrid2 - i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width), -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2 - GlassWidth_VGrid2 - i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width) - gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2 - GlassWidth_VGrid2 - i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width) - gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1 next i
if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then add2 -LeftTotalWidth / 2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 / 2, 0 for i = 0 to vgn_09-1 poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
add2 GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_09 del 1 endif else if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_09 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, LeftTotalWidth/2 + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2 - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -LeftTotalWidth/2 - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, LeftTotalWidth/2 + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 endif endif
put -LeftTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 put -LeftTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk, 1
poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, get(nsp) endif line2 LeftTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, -LeftTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk endif endif
if gs_optype_m_09 <> SASH_FIXED then
add2 0, reb_mod_y
! The Opening Sash is always inside by Single Hung and Double Hung Sash Type if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then add2 0,-2 * gs_sl_thk endif endif
for i = 1 to PanelNumLeft if i = 2 then _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp = _sashFrameWidthLeft _sashFrameWidthRight_temp = _sashFrameWidthRight _sashFrameWidthLeft = _sashFrameWidthRight_temp _sashFrameWidthRight = _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp endif
add2 LeftTotalWidth/2, 0
if iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then fill gs_fillLeaf pen gs_leaf_pen_2D poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -PanelWidth, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -PanelWidth, -gs_sl_thk, 1 else fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -PanelWidth + _sashFrameWidthLeft, 0, 1, -_sashFrameWidthRight, 0, 1, -_sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -PanelWidth + _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk, 1
fill gs_fillLeaf
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -_sashFrameWidthRight, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -_sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk, 1
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -PanelWidth + _sashFrameWidthLeft, 0, 1, -PanelWidth, 0, 1, -PanelWidth, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -PanelWidth + _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk, 1
line_property 2 line2 -_sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk/2, -PanelWidth + _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk/2 line_property 0 endif
del 1
if i = 2 then _sashFrameWidthLeft = _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp _sashFrameWidthRight = _sashFrameWidthRight_temp endif
add2 0, -bSlidingLeft * gs_sl_thk mul2 -1, 1 next i del PanelNumLeft*2 if gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_09 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then del 1 endif endif del 1 else if iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then _glassWidthOv = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
add2 -LeftTotalWidth/2, 0 for i = 1 to vgn_09 line2 0, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth, GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth add2 GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_09
pen gs_frame_pen_cont fill gs_fillFr
for i = 1 to vgn_09-1 if bShowRebateOnFixGlass then poly2_b 8, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1 else poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, GlassWidth_VGrid2, 0, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, 0, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1 endif add2 GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_09-1 del 1 endif
if iMullionStyle_09 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then fill gs_fillLeaf pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
add2 -(gs_frw1 - gs_frame_width_left_2)/2,0 poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -gs_sl_w1/2+gs_frw1, 0, 1, gs_sl_w1/2-gs_frame_width_left_2, 0, 1, gs_sl_w1/2-gs_frame_width_left_2, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -gs_sl_w1/2+gs_frw1, -gs_sl_thk, 1 del 1 endif endif
if bMirroredLeft then del 1 del 1
if bOpeningDirectionSL then del 2
endif
! --- Chinese ----------------------------------------------------------------- if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI | lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED_CHI then
fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -ac_unit_width/2, 0,1, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_sl_w1,0, 1, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_sl_w1,temp_frame_thk, 1, -ac_unit_width/2, temp_frame_thk, 1 else !!!detailed CHI poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_frw1, 0,1, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_sl_w1 - gs_frame_width_left_2, 0, 1, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_sl_w1 - gs_frame_width_left_2, temp_frame_thk, 1, -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_frw1, temp_frame_thk, 1 endif endif
! --- Opening line in 2D------------------------------------------------------- __rightPos = -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_sl_w1 - gs_frame_width_left_2 + rebateWidth __leftPos = -ac_unit_width/2 + gs_frame_width_left - rebateWidth __gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_09 __gs_open_2D = gs_open_2D_sl_left __actSL = 1 ! Left unID = sh_UnID
gosub "SidelightsOpLines" endif
pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
! ============================================================================== ! Right Sidelight ! ==============================================================================
if gs_sidelight_right then
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE then ! 1:200 line2 ac_unit_width/2 + gs_frame_ovhg_right_out, 0, ac_unit_width/2-gs_sl_w2 + gs_frame_width_right_2,0 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_MIDDLE then ! 1:100 fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_frame_pen_cont
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, ac_unit_width/2-gs_frw2, 0,1, ac_unit_width/2-gs_sl_w2+gs_frame_width_right_2, 0, 1, ac_unit_width/2-gs_sl_w2+gs_frame_width_right_2, temp_frame_thk, 1, ac_unit_width/2-gs_frw2, temp_frame_thk, 1 endif
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED then ! 1:50
rebateWidth = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebate | bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
if bOpeningDirectionSL then add2 0,temp_frame_thk mul2 1,-1 endif
reb_mod_y = 0 GlassWidth_VGrid2 = 0 if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED then if iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk - (bShowRebateOnFixGlass * gs_sidelight_rebate_depth) if iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then line_property 2 line2 ac_unit_width/2-gs_frw2, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth, ac_unit_width/2-gs_sl_w2+gs_frame_width_right_2, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth line_property 0 else rebateWidth = 0 endif endif else if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_HOR_PIVOT | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_VER_PIVOT | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_VER_PIVOT_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | \ gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then rebateWidth = 0
! The Opening Sash is always inside by Single Hung and Double Hung Sash Type if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk endif else reb_mod_y = gs_sl_thk - gs_sidelight_rebate_depth endif endif
! Change sash width size by mullion style if (iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_FRENCH_PANEL) then _sashFrameWidthLeft = sashFrameWidth[1][5] _sashFrameWidthRight = sashFrameWidth[2][5] else _sashFrameWidthLeft = gs_sl_fw _sashFrameWidthRight = gs_sl_fw endif
RightTotalWidth = gs_sl_w2 - gs_frw2 - gs_frame_width_right_2 + 2 * rebateWidth PanelWidth = RightTotalWidth if PanelNumRight = 2 then if bSlidingRight then PanelWidth = RightTotalWidth/2 + (min(_sashFrameWidthLeft, _sashFrameWidthRight))/2 else PanelWidth = RightTotalWidth/2 endif endif if vgn_05 > 0 then GlassWidth_VGrid2 = (RightTotalWidth - (vgn_05 - 1) * gs_sidelight_div_width) / (vgn_05)
add2 ac_unit_width/2 - gs_frw2 + rebateWidth - RightTotalWidth/2, 0 if not(bMirroredRight) then mul2 -1, 1
if gs_frame_thkin > gs_sl_thk then
fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_frame_pen_cont
if bSlidingRight then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -RightTotalWidth/2 + PanelWidth,0, 1, RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, RightTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk, 0, -RightTotalWidth/2 + PanelWidth,-gs_sl_thk, 0
add2 0, -gs_sl_thk poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, RightTotalWidth/2 - PanelWidth,0, 0, -RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, -RightTotalWidth/2, -1 * min(gs_sl_thk, -temp_frame_thk-gs_sl_thk), -temp_frame_thk <= 2*gs_sl_thk, RightTotalWidth/2 - PanelWidth,-1 * min(gs_sl_thk, -temp_frame_thk-gs_sl_thk), 0
if -temp_frame_thk > 2*gs_sl_thk then add2 0, -gs_sl_thk poly2_b 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, RightTotalWidth/2 - PanelWidth,0, 0, RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 0, RightTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk+2*gs_sl_thk, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk+2*gs_sl_thk, 0 del 1 endif del 1 else if iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, -RightTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, 1, RightTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, 1, RightTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2, 0, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, RightTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 endif else _glassWidthOv = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
put -RightTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk, 1 put -RightTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
if vgn_05 > 1 then for i = 0 to vgn_05-2 put -RightTotalWidth/2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 + i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width), -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 + i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width), -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 + i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width) + gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 + i * (GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width) + gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1 next i
if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then add2 -RightTotalWidth / 2 + GlassWidth_VGrid2 / 2, 0 for i = 0 to vgn_05-1 poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, GlassWidth_VGrid2/2 + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1
add2 GlassWidth_VGrid2 + gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_05 del 1 endif else if bShowRebateOnFixGlass & (gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_FIXED) & (iMullionStyle_05 <> MULLION_SOLID_PANEL) & (abs(-gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y) > EPS) then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, RightTotalWidth/2 + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -RightTotalWidth/2 - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1, RightTotalWidth/2 + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 endif endif
put RightTotalWidth/2, -gs_sl_thk+reb_mod_y, 1 put RightTotalWidth/2, temp_frame_thk, 1
poly2_b nsp/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, get(nsp) endif line2 -RightTotalWidth/2 + rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk, RightTotalWidth/2 - rebateWidth, temp_frame_thk endif endif
if gs_optype_m_05 <> SASH_FIXED then
add2 0, reb_mod_y
! The Opening Sash is always inside by Single Hung and Double Hung Sash Type if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then add2 0,-2*gs_sl_thk endif endif
for i = 1 to PanelNumRight if i = 2 then _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp = _sashFrameWidthLeft _sashFrameWidthRight_temp = _sashFrameWidthRight _sashFrameWidthLeft = _sashFrameWidthRight_temp _sashFrameWidthRight = _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp endif
add2 -RightTotalWidth/2, 0
if iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then fill gs_fillLeaf pen gs_leaf_pen_2D poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, PanelWidth, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -gs_sl_thk, 1, PanelWidth, -gs_sl_thk, 1 else fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, PanelWidth - _sashFrameWidthLeft, 0, 1, _sashFrameWidthRight, 0, 0, _sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk, 1, PanelWidth - _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk, 0
fill gs_fillLeaf
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, _sashFrameWidthRight, 0, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, -gs_sl_thk, 1, _sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk, 1
poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, PanelWidth - _sashFrameWidthLeft, 0, 1, PanelWidth, 0, 1, PanelWidth, -gs_sl_thk, 1, PanelWidth - _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk, 1
line_property 2 line2 _sashFrameWidthRight, -gs_sl_thk/2, PanelWidth - _sashFrameWidthLeft, -gs_sl_thk/2 line_property 0 endif
del 1
if i = 2 then _sashFrameWidthLeft = _sashFrameWidthLeft_temp _sashFrameWidthRight = _sashFrameWidthRight_temp endif
add2 0, -bSlidingRight * gs_sl_thk mul2 -1, 1 next i del PanelNumRight*2 if gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_SLIDING_VER | gs_optype_m_05 = SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER then if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) exor WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE then del 1 endif endif del 1 else if iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_DIVIDED_FRAME then _glassWidthOv = gs_sidelight_rebate_width * (bShowRebateOnFixGlass)
add2 RightTotalWidth/2, 0 for i = 1 to vgn_05 line2 0, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth, -GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_rebate_depth add2 -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_05
pen gs_frame_pen_cont fill gs_fillFr
for i = 1 to vgn_05-1 if bShowRebateOnFixGlass then poly2_b 8, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, -GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width + _glassWidthOv, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width + _glassWidthOv, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sl_thk + reb_mod_y, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1 else poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penFr_fg, gs_penFr_bg, -GlassWidth_VGrid2, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, 0, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1, -GlassWidth_VGrid2, -gs_sidelight_div_thk, 1 endif
add2 -GlassWidth_VGrid2 - gs_sidelight_div_width, 0 next i del vgn_05-1 del 1 endif
if iMullionStyle_05 = MULLION_SOLID_PANEL then fill gs_fillLeaf pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
add2 -(gs_frw2-gs_frame_width_right_2)/2,0 poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+32, gs_penLeaf_fg, gs_penLeaf_bg, -gs_sl_w2/2+gs_frw2, 0, 1, gs_sl_w2/2-gs_frame_width_right_2, 0, 1, gs_sl_w2/2-gs_frame_width_right_2, -gs_sl_thk, 1, -gs_sl_w2/2+gs_frw2, -gs_sl_thk, 1 del 1 endif endif
if not(bMirroredRight) then del 1 del 1
if bOpeningDirectionSL then del 2
endif
! --- Chinese ----------------------------------------------------------------- if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI | lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED_CHI then
fill gs_FillSdl pen gs_leaf_pen_2D
if lod2D = DET2D_FS_SIMPLE_CHI then poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, ac_unit_width/2, 0,1, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_sl_w2,0, 1, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_sl_w2,temp_frame_thk, 1, ac_unit_width/2, temp_frame_thk, 1 else !!!detailed CHI poly2_b 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_penSdl_fg, gs_penSdl_bg, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_frw2, 0,1, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_sl_w2 + gs_frame_width_right_2, 0, 1, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_sl_w2 + gs_frame_width_right_2, temp_frame_thk, 1, ac_unit_width/2 - gs_frw2, temp_frame_thk, 1 endif endif
! --- Opening line in 2D------------------------------------------------------- __rightPos = ac_unit_width/2 - gs_frame_width_right + rebateWidth __leftPos = ac_unit_width/2 - gs_sl_w2 + gs_frame_width_right_2 - rebateWidth __gs_optype_m = gs_optype_m_05 __gs_open_2D = gs_open_2D_sl_right __actSL = 2 ! Right unID = sh_UnID + 50
gosub "SidelightsOpLines" endif
! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! end ! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
"SidelightsOpLines":
pen gs_winOpLinePen
__sash_thk_oh = 0 if lod2D = DET2D_FS_DETAILED then __sash_thk_oh = gs_sidelight_rebate_depth - gs_sl_thk endif
__gs_frame_thk = 0 if lod2D <> DET2D_FS_SIMPLE then __gs_frame_thk = gs_frame_thk endif
if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) then add2 0,-__gs_frame_thk mul2 1,-1 endif
rev_A = not(bOpeningDirectionSL) * 512 rev_B = bOpeningDirectionSL * 512
if __gs_optype_m = SASH_SIDE_HUNG |\ __gs_optype_m = SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M |\ __gs_optype_m = SASH_TILT_TURN |\ __gs_optype_m = SASH_TILT_TURN_M then
if __gs_optype_m = SASH_SIDE_HUNG |\ __gs_optype_m = SASH_TILT_TURN then
if abs(__gs_open_2D) > EPS & abs(__gs_open_2D - 360) > EPS then line2 __rightPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
line_type gs_winSwingLineType
if gs_iWinSwingType = 1 then ! Curved arc2 __rightPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, ABS(__leftPos-__rightPos), 180, 180+__gs_open_2D else line2 __leftPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh endif endif
! Hotspots add2 0, -__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
if __actSL = 1 then ! Left sidelight hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_left,5 ! Moving else hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_right,5 ! Moving endif
unID = unID + 3 del 1
else if abs(__gs_open_2D) > EPS & abs(__gs_open_2D - 360) > EPS then line2 __leftPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
line_type gs_winSwingLineType
if gs_iWinSwingType = 1 then ! Curved arc2 __leftPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, abs(__leftPos-__rightPos), -__gs_open_2D, 0 else line2 __rightPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh endif endif
! Hotspots add2 0, -__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
if __actSL = 1 then ! Left sidelight hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 6 + rev_B ! Center hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_left,5 ! Moving else hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 6 + rev_B ! Center hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos))*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_right,5 ! Moving endif
unID = unID + 3 del 1 endif endif
if __gs_optype_m = SASH_VER_PIVOT |\ __gs_optype_m = SASH_VER_PIVOT_M then
add2 (__leftPos + __rightPos)/2,0
if __gs_optype_m = SASH_VER_PIVOT then if abs(__gs_open_2D) > EPS & abs(__gs_open_2D - 360) > EPS then line2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk, (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk
line_type gs_winSwingLineType
if gs_iWinSwingType = 1 then ! Curved if __gs_open_2D > ASN(gs_sash_thk / __rightPos) * bFullSashOpeningIn2D then arc2 0, -__gs_frame_thk, abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_open_2D + ASN(gs_sash_thk / __rightPos) * bFullSashOpeningIn2D, 0 endif arc2 0, -__gs_frame_thk, abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 180-__gs_open_2D, 180 else ! Straight line2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2), -__gs_frame_thk, -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk line2 abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_frame_thk, (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk endif endif
! Hotspots add2 0, -__gs_frame_thk
if __actSL = 1 then ! Left sidelight hotspot2 0, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 6 + rev_B ! Center hotspot2 abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_left,5 ! Moving else hotspot2 0, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 6 + rev_B ! Center hotspot2 abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_right,5 ! Moving endif
unID = unID + 3 del 1 else if abs(__gs_open_2D) > EPS & abs(__gs_open_2D - 360) > EPS then line2 (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk, -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk
line_type gs_winSwingLineType
if gs_iWinSwingType = 1 then ! Curved if __gs_open_2D > ASN(gs_sash_thk / __rightPos) * bFullSashOpeningIn2D then arc2 0, -__gs_frame_thk, abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 180, 180+__gs_open_2D - ASN(gs_sash_thk / __rightPos) * bFullSashOpeningIn2D endif arc2 0, -__gs_frame_thk, abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 0, __gs_open_2D else ! Straight line2 (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2), -__gs_frame_thk, (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), (abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk line2 -abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_frame_thk, -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk endif endif
! Hotspots add2 0, -__gs_frame_thk
if __actSL = 1 then ! Left sidelight hotspot2 0, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2), 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_left,5 ! Moving else hotspot2 0, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2), 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_right,5 ! Moving endif
unID = unID + 3 del 1 endif
del 1 endif
if __gs_optype_m = SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG | \ __gs_optype_m = SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN | \ __gs_optype_m = SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN_M then
if abs(__gs_open_2D) > EPS & abs(__gs_open_2D - 360) > EPS then line2 __leftPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh line2 __rightPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
line_type gs_winSwingLineType
if gs_iWinSwingType = 1 then ! Curved arc2 __rightPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, ABS(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, 180, 180+__gs_open_2D arc2 __leftPos, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, ABS(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_open_2D, 0
else line2 __leftPos-(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh line2 __leftPos-(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2, -__gs_frame_thk+__sash_thk_oh, __leftPos+(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D)-__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh endif endif
! Hotspots add2 0, -__gs_frame_thk + __sash_thk_oh
if __actSL = 1 then ! Left sidelight hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_left, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_left,5 ! Moving else hotspot2 __rightPos, 0, unID, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 6 + rev_A ! Center hotspot2 __leftPos, 0, unID + 1, gs_open_2D_sl_right, 4+128 ! Base hotspot2 __rightPos-(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*cos(__gs_open_2D), -(abs(__leftPos-__rightPos)/2)*sin(__gs_open_2D), unID + 2, gs_open_2D_sl_right,5 ! Moving endif endif
if not(bOpeningDirectionSL) then del 2
if iTypeDemolitionFill = 2 then ! RENOVATION_FILL_DEMOLISHED line_type gs_Demolition_linetype else line_type 1 endif return
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
! gs_optype_m SASH_FIXED = 1 ! Fixed Glass SASH_FIXED_SCREW = 2 ! Fixed Sash SASH_SIDE_HUNG = 3 ! Side Hung SASH_SIDE_HUNG_M = 4 ! Side Hung Mirrored SASH_TILT_TURN = 5 ! Tilt and Turn SASH_TILT_TURN_M = 6 ! Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_BOTTOM_HUNG = 7 ! Bottom Hung SASH_TOP_HUNG = 8 ! Top Hung SASH_HOR_PIVOT = 9 ! Horizontal Pivot Hung SASH_VER_PIVOT = 10 ! Vertical Pivotted SASH_TILT_SLIDE = 11 ! Tilt and Slide SASH_LEFT_SLIDING = 12 ! Left Sliding SASH_RIGHT_SLIDING = 13 ! Right Sliding SASH_UP_SLIDING = 14 ! Sliding Up SASH_DOWN_SLIDING = 15 ! Sliding Down SASH_VER_PIVOT_M = 16 ! Vertical Pivotted Mirrored SASH_FIXED_SLIDE = 17 ! Fixed Sliding Sash SASH_DOUBLE_SIDE_HUNG = 18 ! Double Sash SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN = 19 ! Double Tilt and Turn SASH_DOUBLE_TILT_TURN_M = 20 ! Double Tilt and Turn Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_HOR = 21 ! Sliding SASH_SLIDING_HOR_M = 22 ! Sliding Mirrored SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR = 23 ! Double Sliding SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_HOR_M = 24 ! Double Sliding Mirrored SASH_SLIDING_VER = 25 ! Single Hung SASH_DOUBLE_SLIDING_VER = 26 ! Double Hung
